summary: Tenochtitlan, now part of Mexico City, was a big Aztec city built on an island in Lake Texcoco. Founded around March 13, 1325, it became the capital of the Aztec Empire in the 15th century. At its peak, it was the largest city in the Americas before Columbus. It was captured by the Spanish and Tlaxcaltec in 1521. Today, its ruins are in the center of Mexico City, and some of its water systems can be seen in Xochimilco. Tenochtitlan was one of two Aztec city-states on the island, the other being Tlatelolco.
title: Tenochtitlan
